akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3795. Transferred Editorial Notes Codification Section 3795 was editorially reclassified as section 10271 of Title 34, Crime Control and Law Enforcement.
Prior ProvisionsA prior section 3795, Pub. L. 90–351, title I, § 670, as added Pub. L. 91–644, title I, § 12, Jan. 2, 1971, 84 Stat. 1889; amended Pub. L. 93–83, § 2, Aug. 6, 1973, 87 Stat. 218, related to reports to Congress and President, prior to the general amendment of title I of Pub. L. 90–351 by Pub. L. 96–157. See section 10229 of Title 34, Crime Control and Law Enforcement.
